attributes.action: Explain why, when the pound is so strong against the dollar, petrol in the UK is still so high.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We appreciate that oil prices go up and very occasionally go down and seem to except that we are taxed twice on the same product (Duty and VAT on the Duty), but why do we gain no advantage whilst the pound is strong?
